frontmatter.title: Calendar
frontmatter.description: Calendar lets users select a date.

internal.content:
--- title: Calendar description: Calendar lets users select a date. tabs: ["Usage", "Code"] showMobile: true --- Calendar lets users select a date. The dates are arranged in a grid visually for familiarity and easy scanning. ### Structure A calendar is always visible upfront on screen when used i.e. a date can be selected directly unlike a date picker where a date can be selected only after interacting with a trigger. ### Sizes Calendar comes in **2 sizes** - regular and tiny. ### States A time entity in calendar (date, month, year) can come in different states - ![States of a date in calendar](./images/calendar-1.png)

### Usage #### Calendar vs. Date picker Date picker is nothing but a calendar inside a popover and hence a trigger is always required to open it e.g. an input box. On the other hand, calendar is used as an inline component to show a view without additional triggers. ![Calendar is used inline](./images/calendar-2.png)

#### Date with an event Specific date can be highlighted to show that there is an event on that particular day.
